name: Visiting Rila Monastery
description: Explore the Rila Monastery, a stunning example of Bulgarian Renaissance architecture and a UNESCO World Heritage Site.

name: Hiking in Pirin National Park
description: Discover the rugged beauty of Pirin National Park, a UNESCO site with diverse flora and fauna, and ideal for hiking and mountaineering.

name: Exploring Sofia's Historic Center
description: Stroll through Sofia's historic center, featuring a mix of Roman ruins, Ottoman mosques, and Soviet-era monuments.

name: Visiting the Ancient City of Plovdiv
description: Discover Plovdiv, one of Europe's oldest cities, known for its Roman theater, colorful old town, and vibrant cultural scene.

name: Relaxing at the Sunny Beach Resort
description: Enjoy the sun and sea at Sunny Beach, Bulgaria's largest and most popular beach resort.

name: Tasting Bulgarian Wine in the Thracian Valley
description: Experience wine tasting in the Thracian Valley, a region known for its high-quality Bulgarian wines.

name: Exploring Belogradchik Rocks and Fortress
description: Visit the Belogradchik Rocks and Fortress, a natural phenomenon of rock formations and a historical fortress with panoramic views.

name: Touring the Boyana Church
description: Explore the Boyana Church, a medieval Bulgarian Orthodox church on the outskirts of Sofia, famous for its well-preserved frescoes.

name: Visiting the Rose Valley
description: Experience the Rose Valley near Kazanlak, the center of Bulgaria's rose oil production, best visited during the annual Rose Festival.

name: Exploring the Madara Rider
description: See the Madara Rider, an early medieval large rock relief carved on the Madara Plateau and a UNESCO World Heritage Site.
